item.title: Frontier Airlines announces CEO Barry Biffle's sudden departure
item.description: Frontier Airlines CEO Barry Biffle will step down immediately, while airline president James Dempsey will be appointed interim CEO.

item.title: How to transfer Chase Ultimate Rewards points to Air France-KLM Flying Blue
item.description: Here's how to transfer your Chase Ultimate Rewards points to Air France-KLM Flying Blue to book flights.

item.title: Why the end of the year is the perfect time to open a premium credit card
item.description: The end of the year can be a great time to open a new premium rewards credit card. Here are four reasons why.

item.title: The 8 best beaches in Mexico, from the Caribbean to Baja California
item.description: With nearly 6,000 miles of coastline, Mexico has beaches for sun-worshippers, surfers and beach bums. Here are 8 of the best beaches in Mexico.

item.title: The best credit card welcome bonuses of December 2025
item.description: Make sure these elevated and limited-time credit card offers are on your radar this month, or you could end up missing out.
